Articles.Content:
Hi, I've never really looked at it, I though it was an RCS thruster but I've just realized it's a camera.
The description says "Hold down U", I've tried to let it works unsuccessfully.

1 - Is it a stock game part or it came from a mod?
2 - how it works?

That’s a mod part, but I don’t know which mod it comes from. Try to find out the part name (might require some save file sleuthing) and then track it down in your GameData folder- a program like VSCode is good for this as you can find the part name in a file and it will also show you where the file sits in the folder tree. Once you know where it comes from, ask in the forum thread for that mod.

Moved to Add-On Discussions.

There's a wonderful little mod that helps you pinpoint where specific parts come from, called PartInfo.  Should help you figure out exactly where it came from.

35 minutes ago, antipro said:

Hi, I've never really looked at it, I though it was an RCS thruster but I've just realized it's a camera.
The description says "Hold down U", I've tried to let it works unsuccessfully.

1 - Is it a stock game part or it came from a mod?
2 - how it works?

 

It comes with jsi mod AKA ( RPM ) or RasterPropMonitor you can put them on your craft and the bottom far left button  will show you the view on the rpm screen but when you place them it numbers the camera and you can cycle through them but do note no 2 cameras can have the same number

Edited August 29, 2020 by Mecripp

19 minutes ago, Mecripp said:

It comes with jsi mod AKA ( RPM ) or RasterPropMonitor you can put them on your craft and the bottom far left button  will show you the view on the rpm screen but when you place them it numbers the camera and you can cycle through them but do note no 2 cameras can have the same number

thanks, I don't have RasterPropMonitor installed, that's why I think it doesn't work, maybe it came from Mechjeb(as I read "it's a mod that can interact with").

Edited August 29, 2020 by antipro
I can't find the camera part in my parts list after installing the mod. Help?
